cu.explanation_en: Setting remote_s_address to invalid IP '192.168.70.256' (octet 256 > 255) will cause unreachable DU and F1 interface failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting absoluteFrequencySSB to match dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA (640008) will cause frequency misalignment and SSB synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 absoluteFrequencySSB 設定為與 dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA 相同（640008）會導致頻率錯位並造成 SSB 同步失敗。
